author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

It fixes a couple of Tasks in RecoHI/HiTracking , which resulted in a crash of workflow 150 in the IB since the merging of PR #28300. This is now solved by this PR.

#### PR validation:

Worrkflow 150.0 now runs to completion

@jeongeun
title: Fix TripletStep Task for HI Phase1
